title: Flipkart PLA Campaign Seller Portal Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for a Flipkart PLA (Product Listing Ads) Campaign on Seller Portal

Campaign_ID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, e.g., '4BNYE6BWJ953'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the PLA campaign, e.g., 'Frypan Oct'

Campaign_Status.description: Current status of the campaign, e.g., 'LIVE'

Budgeting_Type.description: Type of budgeting for the campaign, e.g., 'DAILY_BUDGET'

campaign_start_date.description: Start date and time of the campaign in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm', e.g., '01-09-2023 09:04'

campaign_end_date.description: End date and time of the campaign in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm', or null if ongoing

campaign_createdAt.description: Date and time when the campaign was created in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm', e.g., '01-09-2023 09:04'

Views.description: Total number of views for the campaign

Clicks.description: Total number of clicks for the campaign

Total_converted_units.description: Total number of converted units (sales) for the campaign

ROI.description: Return on Investment (ROI) for the campaign

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY', e.g., '05-11-2023'
